title: Receipts of Council Taxes: England, April to June 2010 to January to March 2023
description: Receipts of Council Taxes: England, April to June 2010 to January to March 2023
creator: https://www.gov.uk/government/organisations/department-for-levelling-up-housing-and-communities

concepts.label: Note1
concepts.description: These figures have been revised following receipt of Gosport's Q4 2021 to 2022 data.

concepts.label: Note2
concepts.description: This indicates that an authority has revised a previous submission which has resulted in amended figures to the April to June 2022 figures in comparison to the previous publication.

concepts.label: Note3
concepts.description: This indicates that an authority has revised a previous submission which has resulted in amended figures to the July to September 2022 figures in comparison to the previous publication.

concepts.label: Note4
concepts.description: This indicates that an authority has revised a previous submission which has resulted in amended figures to the October to December 2022 figures in comparison to the previous publication.

concepts.label: Note5
concepts.description: This indicates that data has been revised.
